channel.title: Latest Updates at Bechno Kid's Hideout

item.title: 21st of March 2025
item.description: New <a href='/writing/blog/'>journal entry</a>,Updated <a href='/about'>about</a> page.,Added two cliques,Added a <a href='/goodies/greenhouse/'>webgarden</a>,Added a couple of <a href='/goodies/adopts'>adopts</a>,Added a <a href='/outgoing/links'>link</a>,Added two <a href='/outgoing/webrings'>webrings</a>

item.description: Fixed some errors in FreezeframeJS tutorial,Removed PrismJS and made all code blocks pure CSS

item.title: 9th of October 2023
item.description: Started using Eleventy to help code this site!
